summary: The Skillbridge Congressional Fellowship Act of 2025 authorizes eligible members of the armed forces to participate in fellowships within congressional offices, committees, or subcommittees. The Secretary concerned (of the relevant military branch) can approve participation, ensuring appropriate qualifications and limiting participants per office. The bill also mandates an orientation program for participants on legislative processes and ethics. Fellowships are limited to 180 days, and the Assistant Secretary of Defense for Legislative Affairs receives notification of each fellowship.
